title: Turkey livers with veggies
directions: Cut onions to half-moons and dice the kohlrabi, pepper and zucchinis.
Heat the oil on a pan, add onion and fry until golden (about 5 mins). Add livers and then 3 mins later add all the veggies and let it fry for 2 mins. Cover and stew for 3 mins.
Add salt, pepper and serve. For example with couscous.
